episode_event_valentine_2021/4001_1001_0:
Now that you’re here, let’s get started collecting
the ingredients we need to make sweets.
episode_event_valentine_2021/4001_0401_0: By having Pokémon battles at the ingredient shops!
episode_event_valentine_2021/4001_0402_0:
When we find ingredients we want, we have to
challenge that store to a Pokémon battle!
episode_event_valentine_2021/4001_1001_0:
Lear made a special deal with the shops here
on Pasio just for Palentine’s Day.

The deal made it so that we can get the
ingredients we need for Palentine’s Day sweets
through Pokémon battles!
episode_event_valentine_2021/4001_1001_1:
Right! So all we have to do to get ingredients is
win battles!
episode_event_valentine_2021/4001_0301_1: Sounds good! I’m ready to battle!
episode_event_valentine_2021/4001_0401_1:
That’s the spirit! With you and Dawn here, getting
all the ingredients we need will be a piece
of cake!
episode_event_valentine_2021/4001_0302_1: OK! Let’s get lots of ingredients!
episode_event_valentine_2021/4001_0402_1:
Yeah! With you and Dawn here, gathering
ingredients will be a piece of cake!
episode_event_valentine_2021/4001_1001_1:
All right! Before we battle, let’s check what
ingredients we need.

We’re going to make Poké Puffs. They’re a
popular treat in Kalos.

As far as ingredients go, we’ll need frosting,
chocolate, and Berries.
I think the perfect shop for us is right over there!
episode_event_valentine_2021/4001_1001_2: Wait, is that Cheryl over there?

Are you sure I’ll be OK? You’ve done so much to
help me. If I just fail again...

Don’t worry! I know you’ll do a good job with
this recipe.

Oh, hello, Serena and Dawn.
Ah, [Name:PlayerNickname ] is here, too, I see.

Are you all here to gather what you need for
Palentine’s Day sweets?

Yes, but we can stop to help out if there’s
something you need help with!

I see. So there’s someone you want to show your
thanks to, but you’re not very good at
making sweets?

I tried a few times, but I could never quite get
it right.
episode_event_valentine_2021/4001_1001_3:
I was sitting here in front of the shop, trying to
figure out if there was anything I could actually
make, when Cheryl offered to help.

I thought she might have a better chance with a
simple recipe, so I told her one that I know.

But she said that she still wasn’t confident in her
ability with just the recipe alone, so...

I see. In that case, why don’t you two come make
sweets with us?

I know how it feels to have someone special who
you want to show thanks to.
What do you two think of that plan?
episode_event_valentine_2021/4001_0401_3:
I don’t mind, either. Let’s make some tasty
sweets together!
episode_event_valentine_2021/4001_0402_3:
It sure does. Let’s all have fun making some tasty
sweets together!
episode_event_valentine_2021/4001_1001_4: Th-thank you! I’ll do my best!
All right! Let’s get to collecting ingredients!
episode_event_valentine_2021/4002_1001_0:
I think we’ve got the ingredients we need. Now
we just need somewhere to make the sweets.

Oh, hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Are you
getting ready for Palentine’s Day?
episode_event_valentine_2021/4002_0401_0:
Yes! I’m about to head to Professor Bellis’s lab to
make some sweets!
episode_event_valentine_2021/4002_0402_0:
I actually already got all I need. I’m about to head
to Professor Bellis’s lab to make some sweets!
episode_event_valentine_2021/4002_1001_0:
Mina, Professor Bellis, and I are planning to make
them together!

That sounds great! Would you mind if we
tagged along?

I don’t mind! And I bet Professor Bellis will be
happy to see you, too!
episode_event_valentine_2021/4003_1001_0:
Professor Bellis! I found a few reliable friends to
help us make sweets!

Sorry for showing up without notice. Would it be
OK for us to make sweets with you?

Mais bien sûr! But of course! Palentine’s Day is a
day to enjoy together with friends!

I have everything you would ever need to make
sweets here. Have at it!
Thank you! In that case, let’s get right to it!

This oven has such fine controls! It’s so easy
to use!

And this mixer can be set to the exact mixing
strength you want!

Professor Bellis told me that she actually specially
made all of these tools herself!
episode_event_valentine_2021/4003_1001_1:
With all these tools, we’ll be able to make way
better sweets than we’d planned on!
What could have made it explode?!
Are you two OK? You aren’t hurt, are you?

I’m not sure what could have caused an explosion,
but why not try reducing the amount of
ingredients you use?
Hmm... Maybe check the heat you’re using, too?

Oh, Whimsicott! Would you bring us some new
ingredients, please?
Would you like to try mixing with me?

Alcremie, get ready with the frosting for when
they’re done baking!

Don’t worry about breaking any of my tools. I can
always fix them! Just think of this as
an eksperimenteer!
episode_event_valentine_2021/4003_1001_2: Why can’t I ever get it right?

No matter how many times I try, I always fail! I’ve
tried everything! I give up!
episode_event_valentine_2021/4003_0301_2: We have to go after her!
episode_event_valentine_2021/4003_0401_2:
Yes, we do! I want to make sure she makes it to
the end of this baking adventure with us!
episode_event_valentine_2021/4003_0302_2: There are still things she can try!
episode_event_valentine_2021/4003_0402_2:
You’re right! We still have time. I’m sure she’ll
figure it out!
episode_event_valentine_2021/4003_1001_2:
I’ll clean up here. You all run along and find
your friend!

Hey, would you mind if I join you to look for that
girl who just ran off?
episode_event_valentine_2021/4004_1001_0:
I’m glad we found you. We got worried when you
just suddenly ran off.

Let’s all go back to Professor Bellis’s lab
together, OK?

I don’t want to go back. I don’t think I’ll ever get
it right...

But you were trying so hard. Do you really want
to give up?
I can’t keep on trying! I don’t want to fail again!

The important thing on Palentine’s Day is the heart
that you put into your gift!

You worked so hard to collect ingredients and
were doing your best at making the sweets.
episode_event_valentine_2021/4004_1001_1: You’ve already put a lot of heart into it!

You looked like you were having fun when we
were cooking, no matter how many times you
messed up.

You had such a great smile that I forgot what I
was doing and started sketching you instead
of cooking!
Well, you’re right. I was having fun cooking...
episode_event_valentine_2021/4004_1001_3:
I even imagined the looks of happiness on the
faces of the people receiving the sweets.
episode_event_valentine_2021/4004_1001_1:
But just because it’s fun doesn’t mean I can do it
well, and there’s no point if I can’t do it well!

I believe in you! These sweets of yours show just
how much heart you have!

Two? You were trying to make two
different sweets?

Were you maybe trying to make enough for your
partner Pokémon as well?

Well, I think that explains why the ingredients
didn’t work together!
episode_event_valentine_2021/4004_1001_2:
In that case, why don’t we increase the amounts
of the ingredients you’re using and tweak the
recipe a bit as well?

Just increasing the ingredient amounts may
not be enough. We might need to cook them
differently, too...

In Alola, we sometimes just share a single big
malasada with our Pokémon!

That’s a great idea! Instead of making two smaller
ones, we can just make a single big one!
That might be just the idea to make this work!
But...but what if I fail again?
You can do it! I believe in you!

You’ve worked hard and overcome all sorts of
obstacles in the past!
episode_event_valentine_2021/4004_1001_3:
It looked like something was bothering you, so I
got worried and decided to sort of keep an eye
on you...

I’m sorry for following you around without telling
you, but I just can’t bear to see you like this!

You actually regret running away like that, don’t
you. Are you sure you want to give up now?

I think they want to say that they were having fun
making sweets with you!

I was having fun, too. I sure would like to make
sweets with you again!
OK! I’ll try it one more time!
episode_event_valentine_2021/4005_1001_0:
It’s cooked just right, and you’ve decorated it
perfectly as well!

That’s amazing! You can add this to the list of
obstacles you’ve overcome!
Thank you. It’s all thanks to all of you.

I wanted to thank you for always being there to
cheer me on. Thank you!
episode_event_valentine_2021/4005_1001_1:
I’m thankful for you, too! Thank you for always
being by my side!

And thank you for being here today to cheer me
on! Here, let’s split this!
I’m glad everything worked out in the end!
Me too! All right, now it’s our turn to do our best!

Let’s show everyone just how thankful we are
for them!
episode_event_valentine_2021/4006_1001_0: Hehe. This is kind of embarrassing, but...

the reason I called you out here today is because
I had something I just had to give you!
Here it is! Palentine’s Day sweets from me to you!

I made another one later after we all made our
sweets together.

It’s tasty. I guarantee it! Actually, it may be the
tastiest thing I made today!
I worked really hard on it. I hope you’ll accept it.
episode_event_valentine_2021/4006_1001_1:
It’s thanks to you that I’m able to have so much
fun here on Pasio.

If you don’t mind, let’s continue on our
adventure together!
I’m relying on you more than you know...

so I hope we can keep having fun together,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
episode_event_valentine_2021/4007_1001_0: Sorry for calling you out here at a time like this!

To tell you the truth, there’s something that I want
to give you.
Here it is... It’s a Palentine’s Day sweet!

I made it by myself, and I think I burnt it a little.
But don’t worry—I’m sure it still tastes good!
I put all of my thanks into it...
episode_event_valentine_2021/4007_1001_1:
I’m always thankful for all you do for me, but I
thought this would be a good chance to show that!
You’re always helping me out, but you know...
I’d really like to be able to help you out, too!

So feel free to rely on me when you’re
in need!

Promise me that you will!
OK, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
